primCategory.name: TKRMatPrim
primCategory.overview: Materials used in the TKR description
primCategory.prim: material used in tracker conversion for regular trays
material used in tracker conversion for super-GLAST trays, really an alloy of tungsten. When information is available, value should change from "W" to the alloy name
material used in tracker tray core for non superGLAST trays
material used in tracker tray core for superGLAST trays
Composite representing top face sheet, bias board, and surrouding glue
Composite representing bottom face sheet + glue
Composite for bias board + surrounding glue
material used in tracker tray core **OBSOLETE**
